title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: A beginner-friendly course covering the fundamentals of Python, including variables, loops, and functions.

title: Digital Art & Animation Club
description: Join our weekly club to explore digital drawing, character design, and basic animation techniques using modern tools.

title: Advanced Algebra & Pre-Calculus
description: Deep dive into complex algebraic concepts to build a strong foundation for calculus and higher mathematics.

title: Weekend Robotics Workshop
description: A one-time, hands-on workshop where students build and program their own simple robot.

title: The World of Dinosaurs
description: Explore the prehistoric world! Learn about the mighty T-Rex, the gentle Brachiosaurus, and the era they lived in.

title: Creative Writing Club
description: A club for young authors to share stories, write poetry, and learn the art of narrative.

title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your very first interactive website.

title: Junior Scientists: Kitchen Chemistry
description: Discover the science behind everyday cooking with fun, safe, and edible experiments.

title: Public Speaking & Debate Club
description: Build confidence and communication skills in a supportive environment. Learn to argue effectively and speak clearly.

title: History of Ancient Rome
description: From the Republic to the Empire, explore the fascinating history of Roman legions, emperors, and architecture.

title: Minecraft Modding with Java
description: Learn Java programming by creating your own custom mods for Minecraft. A fun way to learn coding.

title: Watercolor Painting Workshop
description: A relaxing one-time workshop to learn the basics of watercolor techniques, including washes and blending.

title: Geometry Explorers
description: A course that makes geometry fun, exploring shapes, angles, and theorems with interactive puzzles and projects.

title: Intro to Spanish Conversation
description: Learn basic conversational Spanish, including greetings, common phrases, and cultural etiquette.

title: Youth Soccer Club
description: A recreational soccer club for all skill levels. Focus on teamwork, fitness, and fun.

title: The American Revolution
description: Study the key events, figures, and outcomes of the war for American independence.

title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
description: Learn the basics of acoustic guitar, including chords, strumming patterns, and how to read tablature.

title: Astronomy: Stars and Galaxies
description: Journey through the cosmos and learn about constellations, black holes, and the life cycle of stars.

title: Chess Masters Club
description: For both beginners and experienced players, this club focuses on strategy, tactics, and sportsmanship.

title: Introduction to 3D Modeling
description: Learn to create 3D models from scratch using Blender, a powerful and free 3D creation suite.

title: Marine Biology Explorers
description: Dive into the study of ocean life, from coral reefs to the deep sea. A fascinating look at marine ecosystems.

title: Filmmaking 101
description: Learn the entire filmmaking process, from screenwriting and storyboarding to shooting and editing your own short film.

title: Math Olympiad Prep Club
description: A club dedicated to solving challenging and unconventional math problems in preparation for competitions.

title: World Mythology
description: Explore the myths and legends of ancient Greece, Rome, Egypt, and Norse cultures. A journey through epic tales.

title: Introduction to French
description: Bonjour! Learn the basics of the French language, from vocabulary and grammar to simple conversations.

title: Basketball Skills Clinic
description: A one-time clinic focusing on fundamental basketball skills like dribbling, shooting, and defense.

title: Digital Music Production
description: Learn to create your own beats and songs using digital audio workstation (DAW) software.

title: Photography Fundamentals
description: Learn about composition, lighting, and exposure to take stunning photos with any camera, even a smartphone.

title: Game Design with Unity
description: A comprehensive course on designing and developing 2D and 3D games using the powerful Unity engine.

title: Young Coders Club
description: An introductory club for young learners to explore programming concepts through Scratch and block-based coding.

title: Calculus I
description: An introduction to differential calculus, covering limits, derivatives, and their applications.

title: Environmental Science: Our Planet
description: Learn about ecosystems, biodiversity, and the environmental challenges facing our planet today.

title: Book Lovers Club
description: A weekly club to discuss popular young adult novels, discover new authors, and share a love for reading.

title: Medieval History: Knights and Castles
description: Explore the Middle Ages, from the feudal system and chivalry to the construction of magnificent castles.

title: Yoga and Mindfulness
description: A course designed to teach young people yoga poses, breathing techniques, and mindfulness for stress reduction.

title: Introduction to Piano
description: A beginner's course for aspiring pianists. Learn to read music, play scales, and simple songs.

title: Improv Comedy Workshop
description: A fun, one-time workshop on the basics of improvisational theater. No experience necessary!

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn how to protect digital information and understand the basics of ethical hacking and online safety.

title: Physics of Motion
description: Explore Newton's laws, gravity, and momentum through demonstrations and hands-on experiments.

title: Statistics and Data Analysis
description: An introductory course on statistics, teaching students how to interpret data, understand probability, and create visualizations.

title: World War II: A Global Perspective
description: A detailed study of the causes, major events, and consequences of the Second World War.

title: Mandarin Chinese for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of Mandarin, including pinyin, tones, basic characters, and simple greetings.

title: Choir and Vocal Training Club
description: A club for students who love to sing. We'll work on harmony, vocal technique, and perform various genres.

title: Sculpture and Pottery
description: Get your hands dirty! Learn to work with clay, from hand-building techniques to using a pottery wheel.

title: App Development for Beginners
description: Learn to design and build a simple mobile app for Android using visual, block-based programming tools.

title: Human Anatomy 101
description: An engaging introduction to the human body, exploring the major organ systems and how they work together.

title: Financial Literacy for Teens
description: Learn essential money management skills, including budgeting, saving, investing, and understanding credit.

title: Martial Arts Intro
description: A course focusing on the basic stances, blocks, and strikes of martial arts, while also teaching discipline and respect.

title: The Art of Storytelling
description: Learn how to craft and deliver compelling stories. A great course for aspiring writers, speakers, and leaders.

title: Pre-Algebra Power Hour
description: Strengthen foundational math skills in preparation for Algebra I, covering fractions, decimals, and integers.

title: Video Game History
description: From Pong to the present day, explore the history and evolution of video games and their impact on culture.

title: Introductory Ukulele Club
description: Learn to play this fun and accessible instrument in a friendly group setting. No musical experience needed!
